devServerTarget.description: Dev server target to run tests against.

mode.description: Run mode of Cypress. Valid value are 'console' and 'browser'

baseUrl.description: Base URL for Cypress to connect to.

ciBuildId.description: Specify a unique identifier for a run to enable grouping or parallelization

group.description: Group recorded tests together under a single run

parallel.description: Run recorded specs in parallel across multiple machines

port.description: The port to use to serve the application.

record.description: Whether to record and upload the test run to Cypress Dashboard

reporterPath.description: Relative path to the reporter based the project root
